source_note: State baseline derived from South Dakota DENR Solid Waste Program and municipal recycling programs; local rules vary widely.

organics.guidance: Composting and mulching of yard waste allowed under DENR guidelines; home composting exempt from regulation.
organics.bin: Green waste bin or drop-off site if offered locally.
organics.notes: Few curbside compost programs; some landfills accept yard waste separately.
provenance: South Dakota DENR Solid Waste Program

paper_cardboard.guidance: Recycle clean, dry paper and cardboard; flatten boxes.
paper_cardboard.bin: Blue recycling bin or local drop-off center.
provenance: City of Sioux Falls recycling info

glass_containers.guidance: Glass accepted at limited drop-off locations; rinse bottles and jars.
glass_containers.bin: Separate glass bin or drop-off only.
glass_containers.notes: Most curbside programs do not collect glass.
provenance: City of Sioux Falls and Rapid City recycling programs

metal_containers.guidance: Recycle aluminum and tin cans; rinse and empty.
metal_containers.notes: No large scrap metal or hazardous containers.

plastics.guidance: Recycle plastic bottles, jugs, and tubs labeled #1â€“#2; other types depend on local programs.
plastics.bin: Blue bin or local drop-off (loose, not bagged).
plastics.notes: Plastic film and foam not accepted curbside.
provenance: City of Sioux Falls recycling materials list

beverage_containers_crv.guidance: South Dakota does not have a statewide deposit/refund system.
beverage_containers_crv.bin: Recycle in curbside or drop-off bins if accepted.

household_batteries.guidance: Recycle rechargeable and lead-acid batteries through HHW programs or collection sites.
household_batteries.bin: Drop-off at HHW or recycling facility.
household_batteries.notes: Do not place batteries in trash or recycling carts.

e_waste.guidance: E-waste accepted at local drop-offs and events; state encourages recycling through DENR partners.
e_waste.bin: Drop-off at e-waste site or collection event.

plastic_bags_and_film.guidance: Plastic bags and film not recyclable curbside.
plastic_bags_and_film.bin: Return to store drop-offs if available.
plastic_bags_and_film.notes: Plastic film often causes recycling contamination.

bulky_items.guidance: Schedule special collection or drop off bulky waste at landfill or transfer station.
bulky_items.notes: Fees and limits apply by city.
